titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Surprise, it's Muskegon County! [videorecording].

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

odd.head: Varying Form of Title
odd.p: Title on container : Muskegon County 2000 update '95.

archdesc.scopecontent: Depicts recent developments in Muskegon County, Mich., in the areas of economic development, commercial and retail development, waterfront development, infrastructure, education, environment, governmental cooperation, image, labor/management, and local revenue.
